item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 25, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. German parliament votes as a Git contribution graph (195 points | 63 comments)
2. Qwen2.5-VL-32B: Smarter and Lighter (415 points | 208 comments)
3. Triforce – a beamformer for Apple Silicon laptops (487 points | 185 comments)
4. Search My Site – open-source search engine for personal and independent websites (30 points | 2 comments)
5. WWI's 'Dazzle' Camouflage Seemed Effective Due to Unexpected Optical Trick (45 points | 10 comments)
6. Three Hundred Years Later, a Tool from Isaac Newton Gets an Update (56 points | 11 comments)
7. Show HN: I'm a teacher and built an AI presentation tool (133 points | 52 comments)
8. CO2 laser enables long-range detection of radioactive material (74 points | 15 comments)
9. MRubyD: A new mruby virtual machine implemented in pure C# (64 points | 13 comments)
10. Brain Scans of Infants Reveal the Moment We Start Making Memories (16 points | discuss)
11. Arc-AGI-2 and ARC Prize 2025 (145 points | 63 comments)
12. Intel: A Bug and a Pro (43 points | 21 comments)
13. Project Operation Whitecoat (2010) (101 points | 76 comments)
14. Can Parrot Brains Teach Us About Human Speech? (12 points | 1 comment)
15. The earliest versions of the first C compiler known to exist (328 points | 143 comments)
16. 600M years of shared environmental stress response found in algae and plants (79 points | 5 comments)
17. I won't connect my dishwasher to your cloud (476 points | 316 comments)
18. Aircraft detection at planetary scale (58 points | 53 comments)
19. The Prospero Challenge (77 points | 29 comments)
20. Mastering Delphi 5 2025 Annotated Edition Is Now Complete (167 points | 86 comments)
21. David Lynch Presents Interview Project (10 points | discuss)
22. Autology: A Lisp with access to its own interpreter (114 points | 45 comments)
23. Peano's Axioms (75 points | 26 comments)
24. Rickover's Lessons (104 points | 89 comments)
25. Gatehouse – a composable, async-friendly authorization policy framework in Rust (56 points | 26 comments)
26. Show HN: LinkedIn sucks, so I built a better one (395 points | 326 comments)
27. The Wright brothers invented the airplane, right? Not if you're in Brazil (221 points | 468 comments)
28. Post Apocalyptic Computing (12 points | 6 comments)
29. Researchers search for more precise ways to measure pain (85 points | 72 comments)
30. Project Aardvark: reimagining AI weather prediction (292 points | 128 comments)
